fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, International co-operation and development, Energy, Environment, Taxation, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: All EU initiatives , policies and legislative files that impact upon Agri-Food production and trading.
organisation_name: Northern Ireland Food and Drink Association Ltd (NIFDA)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: NIFDA is a member of the Confederation of British Industry Northern Ireland Branch.
goals__remit: NIFDA's vision is a strong and united membership working together towards a sustainable and growing internationally competitive food and drink Industry in Northern Ireland.
